okf_baseplaintext.v1.title: Plain Text Filter (BETA) Filter
okf_baseplaintext.v1.description: Configuration for the Okapi Plain Text Filter (BETA) Filter

configurations.name: Plain Text
configurations.description: Plain text files.

configurations.name: Plain Text (Trim Trail)
configurations.description: Text files; trailing spaces and tabs removed from extracted lines.
configurations.parametersRaw:
#v1
unescapeSource.b=true
trimLeading.b=false
trimTrailing.b=true
preserveWS.b=false
useCodeFinder.b=false
codeFinderRules=#v1$0a$count.i=2$0a$rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn]$0a$rule1=(\\r\\n)|\\a|\\b|\\f|\\n|\\r|\\t|\\v$0a$sample=$0a$useAllRulesWhenTesting.b=false
wrapMode.i=0
parametersClass=net.sf.okapi.filters.plaintext.base.Parameters

configurations.name: Plain Text (Trim All)
configurations.description: Text files; leading and trailing spaces and tabs removed from extracted lines.
configurations.parametersRaw:
#v1
unescapeSource.b=true
trimLeading.b=true
trimTrailing.b=true
preserveWS.b=false
useCodeFinder.b=false
codeFinderRules=#v1$0a$count.i=2$0a$rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn]$0a$rule1=(\\r\\n)|\\a|\\b|\\f|\\n|\\r|\\t|\\v$0a$sample=$0a$useAllRulesWhenTesting.b=false
wrapMode.i=0
parametersClass=net.sf.okapi.filters.plaintext.base.Parameters

useCodeFinder.description: Enable pattern-based detection of inline codes (placeholders, tags, etc.)

codeFinderRules.description: Regex patterns to identify inline codes in translatable text

rules.description: List of regex patterns to detect inline codes

pattern.description: Regex pattern for inline code detection

sample.description: Sample text to test patterns against

useAllRulesWhenTesting.description: Test all rules together or individually

simplifierRules.description: Rules for simplifying inline code representation

x-groups.label: Inline Code Handling
x-groups.description: Configure detection and handling of inline codes (placeholders, tags, etc.)

configurations.name: Table (Comma-Separated Values)
configurations.description: Comma-separated values, optional header with field names.
configurations.parametersRaw:
#v1
unescapeSource.b=true
trimLeading.b=true
trimTrailing.b=true
preserveWS.b=false
useCodeFinder.b=false
codeFinderRules=#v1$0a$count.i=2$0a$rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn]$0a$rule1=(\\r\\n)|\\a|\\b|\\f|\\n|\\r|\\t|\\v$0a$sample=$0a$useAllRulesWhenTesting.b=false
wrapMode.i=0
columnNamesLineNum.i=1
valuesStartLineNum.i=2
detectColumnsMode.i=0
numColumns.i=1
sendHeaderMode.i=1
trimMode.i=1
sendColumnsMode.i=2
sourceIdColumns=
sourceColumns=
targetColumns=
commentColumns=
commentSourceRefs=

sourceIdSourceRefs=
sourceIdSuffixes=
targetLanguages=

fieldDelimiter=,
textQualifier="

parametersClass=net.sf.okapi.filters.table.csv.Parameters

configurations.name: Haiku CatKeys
configurations.description: Haiku CatKeys resource files
configurations.parametersRaw:
#v1
unescapeSource.b=false
trimLeading.b=false
trimTrailing.b=false

configurations.description: Doxygen-commented Text Documents
configurations.parametersRaw:
preserve_whitespace: false

custom_commands:

doxygen_commands:
  # structural indicators
  addtogroup: 
    type: PLACEHOLDER
    parameters: 
      - name: name 
        length: WORD
        required: true
        translatable: false
      - name: title 
        length: LINE
        required: false
        translatable: true
  callgraph: 
    type: PLACEHOLDER
  callergraph: 
    type: PLACEHOLDER
  category: 
    type: PLACEHOLDER
    parameters: 
      - name: name 
        length: WORD
        required: true
        translatable: false
      - name: header-file 
        length: WORD
        required: false
        translatable: false
      - name: header-name 
        length: WORD
        required: false
        translatable: false
  class: 
    type: PLACEHOLDER
    parameters: 
      - name: name 
        length: WORD
        required: true
        translatable: false

        length: WORD
        required: false
        translatable: false
      - name: header-name 
        length: WORD
        required: false
        translatable: false

    type: PLACEHOLDER
    parameters: 
      - name: name 
        length: WORD
        required: true
        translatable: false

    type: PLACEHOLDER
    parameters: 
      - name: name 
        length: WORD
        required: true
        translatable: false

        length: LINE
        required: true
        translatable: true

    type: PLACEHOLDER
    parameters: 
      - name: path fragment 
        length: WORD
        required: false
        translatable: false
  enum: 
    type: PLACEHOLDER
    parameters: 
      - name: name 
        length: WORD
        required: true
        translatable: false
  example: 
    type: PLACEHOLDER
    parameters: 
      - name: file-name 
        length: WORD
        required: true
        translatable: false
  endinternal: 
    type: CLOSING
    pair: internal
  extends: 
    type: PLACEHOLDER
    parameters: 
      - name: name 
        length: WORD
        required: true
        translatable: false
  file: 
    type: PLACEHOLDER
    parameters: 
      - name: name 
        length: WORD
        required: false

        required: false

        required: true

    parameters: 
      - name: groupname 
        length: LINE
        required: true
        translatable: false
  interface:

    parameters: 
      - name: name 
        length: WORD
        required: true

      - name: header-file

        required: false

      - name: header-name

    parameters: 
      #- name: item-description 
      #  length: PARAGRAPH
      #  required: true
      #  translatable: true
  n: 
    type: PLACEHOLDER
    inline: true
  p: 
    type: PLACEHOLDER
    inline: true
    parameters: 
      - name: word 
        length: WORD
        required: true
        translatable: true
  rtfonly: 
    type: OPENING
    pair: endrtfonly
    translatable: false
  verbatim: 
    type: OPENING
    pair: endverbatim
    preserve_whitespace: true
  xmlonly: 
    type: OPENING
    pair: endxmlonly
    translatable: false
  #"\\": 
  #  type: PLACEHOLDER
  #"@": 
  #  type: PLACEHOLDER
  "~": 
    type: PLACEHOLDER
    parameters: 
      - name: LanguageId 
        length: WORD
        required: true
        translatable: true
  #"&": 
  #  type: PLACEHOLDER
  #"$": 
  #  type: PLACEHOLDER
  #"#": 
  #  type: PLACEHOLDER
  #"<": 
  #  type: PLACEHOLDER
  #">": 
  #  type: PLACEHOLDER
  #"%": 
  #  type: PLACEHOLDER
  #"\"": 
  #  type: PLACEHOLDER
  #"::": 
  #  type: PLACEHOLDER
  # Group markers. Not explicitly documented as a "command".
  "@{":
    type: PLACEHOLDER
  "@}":
    type: PLACEHOLDER

okf_html.v1.title: HTML/XHTML Filter Filter
okf_html.v1.description: Configuration for the Okapi HTML/XHTML Filter Filter

configurations.name: HTML
configurations.description: HTML or XHTML documents
configurations.parametersRaw:
# Rule types that drive HTML parser behavior
# INLINE inline element
# GROUP group element
# EXCLUDE exclude this element and all children
# INCLUDE exceptions to the exclude rules
# TEXTUNIT make this element a textunit with skeleton before/after
# PRESERVE_WHITESPACE turn on preserve whitespace.
# SCRIPT Embedded scripting languatge - pass to another extractor
# SERVER Embedded server language tags such as JSP, PHP, Mason etc.
# ATTRIBUTE_TRANS, ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE, ATTRIBUTE_READONLY, ATTRIBUTE_ID these rules list an attribute, not an element
# ATTRIBUTES_ONLY only attribute is translatable or localizable

#*********************************************************************************************
# Operators for attribute value compare
#
# Rules are of the form:
# TO_EXTRACT_ATTRIBUTE:[IF_HAS_ATTRIBUTE, OPERATOR, VALUE]
# 'content':['http-equiv', EQUALS, 'keywords']
#
# This rule would read:
# extract the value of 'content' if the value of 'http-equiv' equals 'keywords'
#
# Multiple attribute values may be included in a list:
# 'content':['http-equiv', EQUALS, ['content-language', 'content-type']]
#
# This rule would be read:
# extract the value of 'content' if the value of 'http-equiv' equals 'content-language' or 'content-type'
#*******************************************************************************************/

# EQUALS
# NOT_EQUALS
# MATCH regex match. Must match the entire attribute value

# ELEMENT AND ATTRIBUTE NAMES MUST BE LOWER CASED!!!!!!

assumeWellformed: false
preserve_whitespace: false

attributes:
  # attributes that occur on many elements
  dir:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]
    allElementsExcept: [base, basefront, head, html, meta, param, script]

  title:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_TRANS]
    # HTML5 now allows title on all HTML elements
    # allElementsExcept: [base, basefront, head, html, meta, param, script, title]

  lang:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]

  'xml:lang':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]

  #id:
  #  ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_ID]
  #  onlyTheseElements: [address, dt, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, legend, li, marquee, p, pre, td, th]

  aria-label:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_TRANS]

# ??? accesskey (see doc of translate)
#     https://www.w3.org/TR/html51/dom.html#the-translate-attribute
# ??? cite - Link to the source of the quotation or more information about the edit
#   it is a url, so it might be treated the same as href

elements:
  # only attributes are localizable or translatable - no PCDATA
  # ATTRIBUTES_ONLY with translatableAttributes implies the tag will be a TEXTUNIT
  # with embedded skeleton
  meta:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: {content: [[http-equiv, EQUALS, keywords], [name, EQUALS, [keywords, description]]]}
    writableLocalizableAttributes: {content: [http-equiv, EQUALS, [content-language, content-type]], charset}
    readOnlyLocalizableAttributes: {content: [name, EQUALS, [generator, author, progid, date]]}

  area:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, area, alt, download]
    # download: whether to download the resource instead of navigating to it, and its file name if so

  isindex:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [prompt]

  option:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  optgroup:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  # complex TextUnit rules
  address:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  dt:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  dd:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h1:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h2:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h3:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h4:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h5:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h6:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  legend:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey]
    idAttributes: [id]

  li:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [value]
    idAttributes: [id]

  marquee:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  p:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]
    elementType: paragraph

  pre:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT, PRESERVE_WHITESPACE]
    idAttributes: [id]

  td:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [abbr]
    idAttributes: [id]

  th:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]
    translatableAttributes: [abbr]

  title:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  track:
    translatableAttributes: [label, srclang]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]
    # can we do "something smart" with the kind? Note?
    # this really needs a lang attribute, check that it is updated

  # inline tags
  a:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: link
    translatableAttributes: [title, accesskey, download]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href]

  audio:
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]

  abbr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  acronym:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  applet:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [alt]

  b:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: bold

  base:
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]

  bdo:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  big:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  blink:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

# Seems to cause error
#  blockquote:
#    writableLocalizableAttributes: [cite]

  br:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  button:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, value]

  cite:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  code:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  del:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  dfn:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  em:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  embed:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  font:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  i:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: italic

  iframe:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [srcdoc]
    # src doc is messy, it can be a full html doc, needs parsing.

  img:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: image
    translatableAttributes: [title, alt]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href, src]

  input:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes:
      alt: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      value: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      accesskey: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      title: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      placeholder: [type, NOT_EQUALS, 'dummy']

  ins:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  kbd:

configurations.name: HTML (Well-Formed)
configurations.description: XHTML and well-formed HTML documents
configurations.parametersRaw:
# Rule types that drive HTML parser behavior
# INLINE inline element
# GROUP group element
# EXCLUDE exclude this element and all children
# INCLUDE exceptions to the exclude rules
# TEXTUNIT make this element a textunit with skeleton before/after
# PRESERVE_WHITESPACE turn on preserve whitespace.
# SCRIPT Embedded scripting languatge - pass to another extractor
# SERVER Embedded server language tags such as JSP, PHP, Mason etc.
# ATTRIBUTE_TRANS, ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE, ATTRIBUTE_READONLY, ATTRIBUTE_ID these rules list an attribute, not an element
# ATTRIBUTES_ONLY only attribute is translatable or localizable

#*********************************************************************************************
# Operators for attribute value compare
#
# Rules are of the form:
# TO_EXTRACT_ATTRIBUTE:[IF_HAS_ATTRIBUTE, OPERATOR, VALUE]
# 'content':['http-equiv', EQUALS, 'keywords']
#
# This rule would read:
# extract the value of 'content' if the value of 'http-equiv' equals 'keywords'
#
# Multiple attribute values may be included in a list:
# 'content':['http-equiv', EQUALS, ['content-language', 'content-type']]
#
# This rule would be read:
# extract the value of 'content' if the value of 'http-equiv' equals 'content-language' or 'content-type'
#*******************************************************************************************/

# EQUALS
# NOT_EQUALS
# MATCH regex match. Must match the entire attribute value

# ELEMENT AND ATTRIBUTE NAMES MUST BE LOWER CASED!!!!!!

assumeWellformed: true
preserve_whitespace: false

attributes:
  # attributes that occur on many elements
  dir:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]
    allElementsExcept: [base, basefront, head, html, meta, param, script]

  title:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_TRANS]
    # HTML5 now allows title on all HTML elements
    # allElementsExcept: [base, basefront, head, html, meta, param, script, title]

  lang:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]

  'xml:lang':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]

  #id:
  #  ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_ID]
  #  onlyTheseElements: [address, dt, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, legend, li, marquee, p, pre, td, th]

  aria-label:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_TRANS]

# ??? accesskey (see doc of translate)
#     https://www.w3.org/TR/html51/dom.html#the-translate-attribute
# ??? cite - Link to the source of the quotation or more information about the edit
#   it is a url, so it might be treated the same as href

elements:
  # only attributes are localizable or translatable - no PCDATA
  # ATTRIBUTES_ONLY with translatableAttributes implies the tag will be a TEXTUNIT
  # with embedded skeleton
  meta:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: {content: [[http-equiv, EQUALS, keywords], [name, EQUALS, [keywords, description]]]}
    writableLocalizableAttributes: {content: [http-equiv, EQUALS, [content-language, content-type]], charset}
    readOnlyLocalizableAttributes: {content: [name, EQUALS, [generator, author, progid, date]]}

  area:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, area, alt, download]
    # download: whether to download the resource instead of navigating to it, and its file name if so

  isindex:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [prompt]

  option:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  # Group rules
  dl:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  menu:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  ol:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  optgroup:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  select:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  table:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]
    translatableAttributes: [summary]

  tbody:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  tfoot:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  thead:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  tr:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  ul:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  # complex TextUnit rules
  address:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  dt:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  dd:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h1:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h2:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h3:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h4:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h5:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h6:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  legend:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey]
    idAttributes: [id]

  li:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [value]
    idAttributes: [id]

  marquee:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  p:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]
    elementType: paragraph

  pre:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT, PRESERVE_WHITESPACE]
    idAttributes: [id]

  td:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [abbr]
    idAttributes: [id]

  th:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  title:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  track:
    translatableAttributes: [label, srclang]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]
    # can we do "something smart" with the kind? Note?
    # this really needs a lang attribute, check that it is updated

  # inline tags
  a:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: link
    translatableAttributes: [title, accesskey, download]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href]

  audio:
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]

  abbr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  acronym:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  applet:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [alt]

  b:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: bold

  base:
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]

  bdo:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  big:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  blink:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

# Seems to cause error
#  blockquote:
#    writableLocalizableAttributes: [cite]

  br:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  button:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, value]

  cite:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  code:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  del:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  dfn:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  em:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  embed:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  font:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  i:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: italic

  iframe:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [srcdoc]
    # src doc is messy, it can be a full html doc, needs parsing.

  img:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: image
    translatableAttributes: [title, alt]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href, src]

  input:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes:
      alt: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      value: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      accesskey: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      title: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      placeholder: [type, NOT_EQUALS, 'dummy']

  ins:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  kbd:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  label:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey]

  map:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

# causes null pointer it seems
#  menu:
#    translatableAttributes: [label]

  menuitem:
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  nobr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  object:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [standby]

  param:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [value]

  q:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  s:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  samp:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  small:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  span:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  spacer:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  strike:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  strong:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  sub:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  sup:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  symbol:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  textarea:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, placeholder]

  tt:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  u:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: underlined

  var:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  wbr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Ruby inline tags
  ruby:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rb:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rt:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rc:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rp:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rbc:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rtc:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Robo help inline tags
  symbol:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  face:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Excluded elements
  '.*':
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]
    conditions: [translate, EQUALS, 'no']

  style:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]

  stylesheet:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]

#  # Included elements
#  '.*':
#    ruleTypes: [INCLUDE]
#    conditions: [translate, EQUALS, 'yes']

  # javascript etc.
  script:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]

# Todo, complicated:
# styles in the style attribute and element
# need updating for directions, alignemnts, offsets, margins (rtl)
# Take a look at CSSJanus: https://github.com/cssjanus/cssjanus
# Also need translation for 'content'
# Might also be nice to change fonts

  # ATTRIBUTES_ONLY with translatableAttributes implies the tag will be a TEXTUNIT
  # with embedded skeleton
  meta:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: {content: [[http-equiv, EQUALS, keywords], [name, EQUALS, [keywords, description]]]}
    writableLocalizableAttributes: {content: [http-equiv, EQUALS, [content-language, content-type]], charset}
    readOnlyLocalizableAttributes: {content: [name, EQUALS, [generator, author, progid, date]]}

  area:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, area, alt, download]
    # download: whether to download the resource instead of navigating to it, and its file name if so

  isindex:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [prompt]

  option:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  # Group rules
  dl:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  menu:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  ol:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  optgroup:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  select:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  table:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]
    translatableAttributes: [summary]

  tbody:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  tfoot:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  thead:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  tr:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  ul:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  # complex TextUnit rules
  address:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  dt:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  dd:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h1:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h2:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h3:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h4:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h5:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h6:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  legend:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey]
    idAttributes: [id]

  li:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [value]
    idAttributes: [id]

  marquee:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  p:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]
    elementType: paragraph

  pre:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT, PRESERVE_WHITESPACE]
    idAttributes: [id]

  td:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [abbr]
    idAttributes: [id]

  th:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  title:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  track:
    translatableAttributes: [label, srclang]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]
    # can we do "something smart" with the kind? Note?
    # this really needs a lang attribute, check that it is updated

  # inline tags
  a:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: link
    translatableAttributes: [title, accesskey, download]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href]

  audio:
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]

  abbr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  acronym:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  applet:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [alt]

  b:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: bold

  base:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href]

  bdo:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  big:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  blink:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

# Seems to cause error
#  blockquote:
#    writableLocalizableAttributes: [cite]

  br:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  button:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, value]

  cite:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  code:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  del:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  dfn:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  em:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  embed:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  font:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  i:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: italic

  iframe:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [srcdoc]
    # src doc is messy, it can be a full html doc, needs parsing.

  img:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: image
    translatableAttributes: [title, alt]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href, src]

  input:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes:
      alt: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      value: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      accesskey: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      title: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      placeholder: [type, NOT_EQUALS, 'dummy']

  ins:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  kbd:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  label:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey]

  map:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

# causes null pointer it seems
#  menu:
#    translatableAttributes: [label]

  menuitem:
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  nobr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  object:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [standby]

  param:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [value]

  q:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  s:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  samp:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  small:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  span:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  spacer:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  strike:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  strong:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  sub:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  sup:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  symbol:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  textarea:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, placeholder]

  tt:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  u:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: underlined

  var:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  wbr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Ruby inline tags
  ruby:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rb:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rt:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rc:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rp:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rbc:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rtc:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Robo help inline tags
  symbol:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  face:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Excluded elements
  '.*':
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]
    conditions: [translate, EQUALS, 'no']

  style:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]

  stylesheet:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]

#  # Included elements
#  '.*':
#    ruleTypes: [INCLUDE]
#    conditions: [translate, EQUALS, 'yes']

  # javascript etc.
  script:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]

# Todo, complicated:
# styles in the style attribute and element
# need updating for directions, alignemnts, offsets, margins (rtl)
# Take a look at CSSJanus: https://github.com/cssjanus/cssjanus
# Also need translation for 'content'
# Might also be nice to change fonts

configurations.name: HTML
configurations.description: HTML or XHTML documents
configurations.parametersRaw:
# Rule types that drive HTML parser behavior
# INLINE inline element
# GROUP group element
# EXCLUDE exclude this element and all children
# INCLUDE exceptions to the exclude rules
# TEXTUNIT make this element a textunit with skeleton before/after
# PRESERVE_WHITESPACE turn on preserve whitespace.
# SCRIPT Embedded scripting languatge - pass to another extractor
# SERVER Embedded server language tags such as JSP, PHP, Mason etc.
# ATTRIBUTE_TRANS, ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE, ATTRIBUTE_READONLY, ATTRIBUTE_ID these rules list an attribute, not an element
# ATTRIBUTES_ONLY only attribute is translatable or localizable

#*********************************************************************************************
# Operators for attribute value compare
#
# Rules are of the form:
# TO_EXTRACT_ATTRIBUTE:[IF_HAS_ATTRIBUTE, OPERATOR, VALUE]
# 'content':['http-equiv', EQUALS, 'keywords']
#
# This rule would read:
# extract the value of 'content' if the value of 'http-equiv' equals 'keywords'
#
# Multiple attribute values may be included in a list:
# 'content':['http-equiv', EQUALS, ['content-language', 'content-type']]
#
# This rule would be read:
# extract the value of 'content' if the value of 'http-equiv' equals 'content-language' or 'content-type'
#*******************************************************************************************/

# EQUALS
# NOT_EQUALS
# MATCH regex match. Must match the entire attribute value

# ELEMENT AND ATTRIBUTE NAMES MUST BE LOWER CASED!!!!!!

assumeWellformed: false
preserve_whitespace: false

attributes:
  # attributes that occur on many elements
  dir:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]
    allElementsExcept: [base, basefront, head, html, meta, param, script]

  title:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_TRANS]
    # HTML5 now allows title on all HTML elements
    # allElementsExcept: [base, basefront, head, html, meta, param, script, title]

  lang:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]

  'xml:lang':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]

  #id:
  #  ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_ID]
  #  onlyTheseElements: [address, dt, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, legend, li, marquee, p, pre, td, th]

  aria-label:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_TRANS]

# ??? accesskey (see doc of translate)
#     https://www.w3.org/TR/html51/dom.html#the-translate-attribute
# ??? cite - Link to the source of the quotation or more information about the edit
#   it is a url, so it might be treated the same as href

elements:
  # only attributes are localizable or translatable - no PCDATA
  # ATTRIBUTES_ONLY with translatableAttributes implies the tag will be a TEXTUNIT
  # with embedded skeleton
  meta:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: {content: [[http-equiv, EQUALS, keywords], [name, EQUALS, [keywords, description, twitter:title, twitter:description, og:title, og:description, og:site_name]]]}
    writableLocalizableAttributes: {content: [http-equiv, EQUALS, [content-language, content-type]], charset}
    readOnlyLocalizableAttributes: {content: [name, EQUALS, [generator, author, progid, date]]}

  area:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, area, alt, download]
    # download: whether to download the resource instead of navigating to it, and its file name if so

  isindex:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [prompt]

  option:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  optgroup:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  # complex TextUnit rules
  address:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  dt:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  dd:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h1:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h2:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h3:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h4:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h5:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h6:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  legend:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey]
    idAttributes: [id]

  li:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [value]
    idAttributes: [id]

  marquee:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  p:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]
    elementType: paragraph

  pre:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT, PRESERVE_WHITESPACE]
    idAttributes: [id]

  td:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [abbr]
    idAttributes: [id]

  th:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]
    translatableAttributes: [abbr]

  title:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  track:
    translatableAttributes: [label, srclang]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]
    # can we do "something smart" with the kind? Note?
    # this really needs a lang attribute, check that it is updated

  # inline tags
  a:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: link
    translatableAttributes: [title, accesskey, download]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href]

  audio:
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]

  abbr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  acronym:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  applet:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [alt]

  b:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: bold

  base:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href]

  bdo:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  big:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  blink:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

# Seems to cause error
#  blockquote:
#    writableLocalizableAttributes: [cite]

  br:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  button:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, value]

  cite:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  code:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  del:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  dfn:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  em:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  embed:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  font:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  i:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: italic

  iframe:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [srcdoc]
    # src doc is messy, it can be a full html doc, needs parsing.

  img:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: image
    translatableAttributes: [title, alt]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href, src]

  input:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes:
      alt: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      value: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      accesskey: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      title: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      placeholder: [type, NOT_EQUALS, 'dummy']

  ins:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  kbd:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  label:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey]

  map:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

# causes null pointer it seems
#  menu:
#    translatableAttributes: [label]

  menuitem:
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  nobr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  object:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [standby]

  param:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [value]

  q:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  s:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  samp:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  small:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  select:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  span:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  spacer:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  strike:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  strong:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  sub:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  sup:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  table:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [summary]

  textarea:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, placeholder]

  tt:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  u:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: underlined

  var:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  wbr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Ruby inline tags
  ruby:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rb:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rt:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

configurations.name: HTML
configurations.description: HTML or XHTML documents
configurations.parametersRaw:
# Rule types that drive HTML parser behavior
# INLINE inline element
# GROUP group element
# EXCLUDE exclude this element and all children
# INCLUDE exceptions to the exclude rules
# TEXTUNIT make this element a textunit with skeleton before/after
# PRESERVE_WHITESPACE turn on preserve whitespace.
# SCRIPT Embedded scripting languatge - pass to another extractor
# SERVER Embedded server language tags such as JSP, PHP, Mason etc.
# ATTRIBUTE_TRANS, ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE, ATTRIBUTE_READONLY, ATTRIBUTE_ID these rules list an attribute, not an element
# ATTRIBUTES_ONLY only attribute is translatable or localizable

#*********************************************************************************************
# Operators for attribute value compare
#
# Rules are of the form:
# TO_EXTRACT_ATTRIBUTE:[IF_HAS_ATTRIBUTE, OPERATOR, VALUE]
# 'content':['http-equiv', EQUALS, 'keywords']
#
# This rule would read:
# extract the value of 'content' if the value of 'http-equiv' equals 'keywords'
#
# Multiple attribute values may be included in a list:
# 'content':['http-equiv', EQUALS, ['content-language', 'content-type']]
#
# This rule would be read:
# extract the value of 'content' if the value of 'http-equiv' equals 'content-language' or 'content-type'
#*******************************************************************************************/

# EQUALS
# NOT_EQUALS
# MATCH regex match. Must match the entire attribute value

# ELEMENT AND ATTRIBUTE NAMES MUST BE LOWER CASED!!!!!!

assumeWellformed: false
preserve_whitespace: false

attributes:
  # attributes that occur on many elements
  dir:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]
    allElementsExcept: [base, basefront, head, html, meta, param, script]

  title:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_TRANS]
    # HTML5 now allows title on all HTML elements
    # allElementsExcept: [base, basefront, head, html, meta, param, script, title]

  lang:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]

  'xml:lang':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]

  #id:
  #  ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_ID]
  #  onlyTheseElements: [address, dt, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, legend, li, marquee, p, pre, td, th]

  aria-label:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_TRANS]

# ??? accesskey (see doc of translate)
#     https://www.w3.org/TR/html51/dom.html#the-translate-attribute
# ??? cite - Link to the source of the quotation or more information about the edit
#   it is a url, so it might be treated the same as href

elements:
  # only attributes are localizable or translatable - no PCDATA
  # ATTRIBUTES_ONLY with translatableAttributes implies the tag will be a TEXTUNIT
  # with embedded skeleton
  meta:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: {content: [[http-equiv, EQUALS, keywords], [name, EQUALS, [keywords, description, twitter:title, twitter:description, og:title, og:description, og:site_name]]]}
    writableLocalizableAttributes: {content: [http-equiv, EQUALS, [content-language, content-type]], charset}
    readOnlyLocalizableAttributes: {content: [name, EQUALS, [generator, author, progid, date]]}

  area:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, area, alt, download]
    # download: whether to download the resource instead of navigating to it, and its file name if so

  isindex:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [prompt]

  option:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  optgroup:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  # complex TextUnit rules
  address:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  dt:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  dd:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h1:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h2:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h3:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h4:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h5:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h6:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  legend:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey]
    idAttributes: [id]

  li:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [value]
    idAttributes: [id]

  marquee:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  p:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]
    elementType: paragraph

  pre:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT, PRESERVE_WHITESPACE]
    idAttributes: [id]

  td:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [abbr]
    idAttributes: [id]

  th:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]
    translatableAttributes: [abbr]

  title:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  track:
    translatableAttributes: [label, srclang]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]
    # can we do "something smart" with the kind? Note?
    # this really needs a lang attribute, check that it is updated

  # inline tags
  a:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: link
    translatableAttributes: [title, accesskey, download]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href]

  audio:
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]

  abbr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  acronym:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  applet:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [alt]

  b:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: bold

  base:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href]

  bdo:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  big:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  blink:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

# Seems to cause error
#  blockquote:
#    writableLocalizableAttributes: [cite]

  br:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  button:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, value]

  cite:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  code:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  del:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  dfn:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  em:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  embed:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  font:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  i:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: italic

  iframe:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [srcdoc]
    # src doc is messy, it can be a full html doc, needs parsing.

  img:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: image
    translatableAttributes: [title, alt]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href, src]

  input:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes:
      alt: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      value: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      accesskey: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      title: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      placeholder: [type, NOT_EQUALS, 'dummy']

  ins:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  kbd:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  label:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey]

  map:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

# causes null pointer it seems
#  menu:
#    translatableAttributes: [label]

  menuitem:
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  nobr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  object:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [standby]

  param:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [value]

  q:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  s:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  samp:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  small:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  select:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  span:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  spacer:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  strike:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  strong:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  sub:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  sup:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  table:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [summary]

  textarea:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, placeholder]

  tt:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  u:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: underlined

  var:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  wbr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Ruby inline tags
  ruby:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rb:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rt:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rc:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rp:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rbc:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rtc:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Robo help inline tags
  symbol:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  face:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Excluded elements
  '.*':
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]
    conditions: [translate, EQUALS, 'no']

  # Included elements (must have both rules!!!)
  '.+':
      ruleTypes: [INCLUDE]
      conditions: [translate, EQUALS, 'yes']

  style:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]

  stylesheet:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]

  # javascript etc.
  script:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]

# Todo, complicated:
# styles in the style attribute and element
# need updating for directions, alignemnts, offsets, margins (rtl)
# Take a look at CSSJanus: https://github.com/cssjanus/cssjanus
# Also need translation for 'content'
# Might also be nice to change fonts

configurations.name: HTML (Well-Formed)
configurations.description: XHTML and well-formed HTML documents
configurations.parametersRaw:
# Rule types that drive HTML parser behavior
# INLINE inline element
# GROUP group element
# EXCLUDE exclude this element and all children
# INCLUDE exceptions to the exclude rules
# TEXTUNIT make this element a textunit with skeleton before/after
# PRESERVE_WHITESPACE turn on preserve whitespace.
# SCRIPT Embedded scripting languatge - pass to another extractor
# SERVER Embedded server language tags such as JSP, PHP, Mason etc.
# ATTRIBUTE_TRANS, ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE, ATTRIBUTE_READONLY, ATTRIBUTE_ID these rules list an attribute, not an element
# ATTRIBUTES_ONLY only attribute is translatable or localizable

#*********************************************************************************************
# Operators for attribute value compare
#
# Rules are of the form:
# TO_EXTRACT_ATTRIBUTE:[IF_HAS_ATTRIBUTE, OPERATOR, VALUE]
# 'content':['http-equiv', EQUALS, 'keywords']
#
# This rule would read:
# extract the value of 'content' if the value of 'http-equiv' equals 'keywords'
#
# Multiple attribute values may be included in a list:
# 'content':['http-equiv', EQUALS, ['content-language', 'content-type']]
#
# This rule would be read:
# extract the value of 'content' if the value of 'http-equiv' equals 'content-language' or 'content-type'
#*******************************************************************************************/

# EQUALS
# NOT_EQUALS
# MATCH regex match. Must match the entire attribute value

# ELEMENT AND ATTRIBUTE NAMES MUST BE LOWER CASED!!!!!!

assumeWellformed: true
preserve_whitespace: false

attributes:
  # attributes that occur on many elements
  dir:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]
    allElementsExcept: [base, basefront, head, html, meta, param, script]

  title:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_TRANS]
    # HTML5 now allows title on all HTML elements
    # allElementsExcept: [base, basefront, head, html, meta, param, script, title]

  lang:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]

  'xml:lang':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]

  #id:
  #  ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_ID]
  #  onlyTheseElements: [address, dt, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, legend, li, marquee, p, pre, td, th]

  aria-label:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_TRANS]

# ??? accesskey (see doc of translate)
#     https://www.w3.org/TR/html51/dom.html#the-translate-attribute
# ??? cite - Link to the source of the quotation or more information about the edit
#   it is a url, so it might be treated the same as href

elements:
  # only attributes are localizable or translatable - no PCDATA
  # ATTRIBUTES_ONLY with translatableAttributes implies the tag will be a TEXTUNIT
  # with embedded skeleton
  meta:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: {content: [[http-equiv, EQUALS, keywords], [name, EQUALS, [keywords, description, twitter:title, twitter:description, og:title, og:description, og:site_name]]]}
    writableLocalizableAttributes: {content: [http-equiv, EQUALS, [content-language, content-type]], charset}
    readOnlyLocalizableAttributes: {content: [name, EQUALS, [generator, author, progid, date]]}

  area:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, area, alt, download]
    # download: whether to download the resource instead of navigating to it, and its file name if so

  isindex:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [prompt]

  option:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  # Group rules
  dl:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  menu:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  ol:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  optgroup:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  select:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  table:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]
    translatableAttributes: [summary]

  tbody:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  tfoot:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  thead:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  tr:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  ul:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  # complex TextUnit rules
  address:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  dt:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  dd:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h1:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h2:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h3:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h4:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h5:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h6:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  legend:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey]
    idAttributes: [id]

  li:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [value]
    idAttributes: [id]

  marquee:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  p:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]
    elementType: paragraph

  pre:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT, PRESERVE_WHITESPACE]
    idAttributes: [id]

  td:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [abbr]
    idAttributes: [id]

  th:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  title:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  track:
    translatableAttributes: [label, srclang]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]
    # can we do "something smart" with the kind? Note?
    # this really needs a lang attribute, check that it is updated

  # inline tags
  a:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: link
    translatableAttributes: [title, accesskey, download]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href]

  audio:
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]

  abbr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  acronym:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  applet:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [alt]

  b:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  base:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href]

  bdo:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  big:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  blink:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

# Seems to cause error
#  blockquote:

  br:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  button:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, value]

  cite:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  code:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  del:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  dfn:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  em:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  embed:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  font:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  i:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: italic

  iframe:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [srcdoc]
    # src doc is messy, it can be a full html doc, needs parsing.

  img:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: image
    translatableAttributes: [title, alt]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href, src]

  input:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes:
      alt: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      value: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      accesskey: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      title: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      placeholder: [type, NOT_EQUALS, 'dummy']

  ins:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  kbd:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  label:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey]

  map:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

# causes null pointer it seems
#  menu:

  menuitem:

  nobr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

configurations.name: HTML (Well-Formed)
configurations.description: XHTML and well-formed HTML documents
configurations.parametersRaw:
# Rule types that drive HTML parser behavior
# INLINE inline element
# GROUP group element
# EXCLUDE exclude this element and all children
# INCLUDE exceptions to the exclude rules
# TEXTUNIT make this element a textunit with skeleton before/after
# PRESERVE_WHITESPACE turn on preserve whitespace.
# SCRIPT Embedded scripting languatge - pass to another extractor
# SERVER Embedded server language tags such as JSP, PHP, Mason etc.
# ATTRIBUTE_TRANS, ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE, ATTRIBUTE_READONLY, ATTRIBUTE_ID these rules list an attribute, not an element
# ATTRIBUTES_ONLY only attribute is translatable or localizable

#*********************************************************************************************
# Operators for attribute value compare
#
# Rules are of the form:
# TO_EXTRACT_ATTRIBUTE:[IF_HAS_ATTRIBUTE, OPERATOR, VALUE]
# 'content':['http-equiv', EQUALS, 'keywords']
#
# This rule would read:
# extract the value of 'content' if the value of 'http-equiv' equals 'keywords'
#
# Multiple attribute values may be included in a list:
# 'content':['http-equiv', EQUALS, ['content-language', 'content-type']]
#
# This rule would be read:
# extract the value of 'content' if the value of 'http-equiv' equals 'content-language' or 'content-type'
#*******************************************************************************************/

# EQUALS
# NOT_EQUALS
# MATCH regex match. Must match the entire attribute value

# ELEMENT AND ATTRIBUTE NAMES MUST BE LOWER CASED!!!!!!

assumeWellformed: true
preserve_whitespace: false
skipEncodingDeclaration: false

attributes:
  # attributes that occur on many elements
  dir:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]
    allElementsExcept: [base, basefront, head, html, meta, param, script]

  title:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_TRANS]
    # HTML5 now allows title on all HTML elements
    # allElementsExcept: [base, basefront, head, html, meta, param, script, title]

  lang:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]

  'xml:lang':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]

  #id:
  #  ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_ID]
  #  onlyTheseElements: [address, dt, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, legend, li, marquee, p, pre, td, th]

  aria-label:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_TRANS]

# ??? accesskey (see doc of translate)
#     https://www.w3.org/TR/html51/dom.html#the-translate-attribute
# ??? cite - Link to the source of the quotation or more information about the edit
#   it is a url, so it might be treated the same as href

elements:
  # only attributes are localizable or translatable - no PCDATA
  # ATTRIBUTES_ONLY with translatableAttributes implies the tag will be a TEXTUNIT
  # with embedded skeleton
  meta:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: {content: [[http-equiv, EQUALS, keywords], [name, EQUALS, [keywords, description, twitter:title, twitter:description, og:title, og:description, og:site_name]]]}
    writableLocalizableAttributes: {content: [http-equiv, EQUALS, [content-language, content-type]], charset}
    readOnlyLocalizableAttributes: {content: [name, EQUALS, [generator, author, progid, date]]}

  area:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, area, alt, download]
    # download: whether to download the resource instead of navigating to it, and its file name if so

  isindex:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [prompt]

  option:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  # Group rules
  dl:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  menu:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  ol:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  optgroup:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  select:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  table:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]
    translatableAttributes: [summary]

  tbody:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  tfoot:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  thead:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  tr:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  ul:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  # complex TextUnit rules
  address:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  dt:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  dd:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h1:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h2:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h3:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h4:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h5:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h6:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  legend:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey]
    idAttributes: [id]

  li:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [value]
    idAttributes: [id]

  marquee:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  p:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]
    elementType: paragraph

  pre:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT, PRESERVE_WHITESPACE]
    idAttributes: [id]

  td:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [abbr]
    idAttributes: [id]

  th:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  title:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  track:
    translatableAttributes: [label, srclang]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]
    # can we do "something smart" with the kind? Note?
    # this really needs a lang attribute, check that it is updated

  # inline tags
  a:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: link
    translatableAttributes: [title, accesskey, download]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href]

  audio:
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]

  abbr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  acronym:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  applet:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [alt]

  b:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: bold

  base:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href]

  bdo:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  big:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  blink:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

# Seems to cause error
#  blockquote:
#    writableLocalizableAttributes: [cite]

  br:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  button:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, value]

  cite:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  code:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  del:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  dfn:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  em:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  embed:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  font:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  i:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: italic

  iframe:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [srcdoc]
    # src doc is messy, it can be a full html doc, needs parsing.

  img:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: image
    translatableAttributes: [title, alt]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href, src]

  input:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes:
      alt: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      value: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      accesskey: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      title: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      placeholder: [type, NOT_EQUALS, 'dummy']

  ins:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  kbd:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  label:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey]

  map:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

# causes null pointer it seems
#  menu:

  menuitem:

  nobr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  object:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  param:

  q:

  small:

  span:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  spacer:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  strike:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  strong:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  sub:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  sup:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  textarea:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, placeholder]

  tt:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  u:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: underlined

  var:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  wbr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Ruby inline tags
  ruby:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rb:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rt:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rp:

    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rtc:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Robo help inline tags
  symbol:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Excluded elements
  '.*':
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]
    conditions: [translate, EQUALS, 'no']

  # Included elements (must have both rules!!!)

    conditions: [translate, EQUALS, 'yes']

    allElementsExcept: [base, basefront, head, html, meta, param, script]

  title:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_TRANS]
    # HTML5 now allows title on all HTML elements
    # allElementsExcept: [base, basefront, head, html, meta, param, script, title]

  lang:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]

  'xml:lang':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]

  #id:
  #  ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_ID]
  #  onlyTheseElements: [address, dt, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, legend, li, marquee, p, pre, td, th]

  aria-label:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_TRANS]

# ??? accesskey (see doc of translate)
#     https://www.w3.org/TR/html51/dom.html#the-translate-attribute
# ??? cite - Link to the source of the quotation or more information about the edit
#   it is a url, so it might be treated the same as href

elements:
  # only attributes are localizable or translatable - no PCDATA
  # ATTRIBUTES_ONLY with translatableAttributes implies the tag will be a TEXTUNIT
  # with embedded skeleton
  meta:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: {content: [[http-equiv, EQUALS, keywords], [name, EQUALS, [keywords, description, twitter:title, twitter:description, og:title, og:description, og:site_name]]]}
    writableLocalizableAttributes: {content: [http-equiv, EQUALS, [content-language, content-type]], charset}
    readOnlyLocalizableAttributes: {content: [name, EQUALS, [generator, author, progid, date]]}

  area:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, area, alt, download]
    # download: whether to download the resource instead of navigating to it, and its file name if so

  isindex:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [prompt]

  option:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  # Group rules
  dl:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  menu:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  ol:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  optgroup:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  select:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  table:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]
    translatableAttributes: [summary]

  tbody:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  tfoot:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  thead:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  tr:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  ul:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  # complex TextUnit rules
  address:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  dt:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  dd:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h1:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h2:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h3:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h4:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h5:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h6:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  legend:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey]
    idAttributes: [id]

  li:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [value]
    idAttributes: [id]

  marquee:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  p:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]
    elementType: paragraph

  pre:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT, PRESERVE_WHITESPACE]
    idAttributes: [id]

  td:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [abbr]
    idAttributes: [id]

  th:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  title:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  track:
    translatableAttributes: [label, srclang]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]
    # can we do "something smart" with the kind? Note?
    # this really needs a lang attribute, check that it is updated

  # inline tags
  a:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: link
    translatableAttributes: [title, accesskey, download]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href]

  audio:
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]

  abbr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  acronym:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  applet:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [alt]

  b:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: bold

  base:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href]

  bdo:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  big:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  blink:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

# Seems to cause error
#  blockquote:
#    writableLocalizableAttributes: [cite]

  br:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  button:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, value]

  cite:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  code:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  del:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  dfn:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  em:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  embed:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  font:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  i:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: italic

  iframe:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [srcdoc]
    # src doc is messy, it can be a full html doc, needs parsing.

  img:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: image
    translatableAttributes: [title, alt]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href, src]

  input:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes:
      alt: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      value: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      accesskey: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      title: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      placeholder: [type, NOT_EQUALS, 'dummy']

  ins:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  kbd:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  label:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey]

  map:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

# causes null pointer it seems
#  menu:
#    translatableAttributes: [label]

  menuitem:
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  nobr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  object:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [standby]

  param:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [value]

  q:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  s:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  samp:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  small:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  span:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  spacer:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  strike:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  strong:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  sub:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  sup:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  textarea:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, placeholder]

  tt:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  u:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: underlined

  var:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  wbr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Ruby inline tags
  ruby:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rb:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rt:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rc:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rp:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rbc:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rtc:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Robo help inline tags
  symbol:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  face:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Excluded elements
  '.*':
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]
    conditions: [translate, EQUALS, 'no']

  # Included elements (must have both rules!!!)
  '.+':
    ruleTypes: [INCLUDE]
    conditions: [translate, EQUALS, 'yes']

  style:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]

  stylesheet:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]

  # javascript etc.
  script:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]

# Todo, complicated:
# styles in the style attribute and element
# need updating for directions, alignemnts, offsets, margins (rtl)
# Take a look at CSSJanus: https://github.com/cssjanus/cssjanus
# Also need translation for 'content'
# Might also be nice to change fonts

okf_html5.v1.title: HTML5-ITS Filter Filter
okf_html5.v1.description: Configuration for the Okapi HTML5-ITS Filter Filter

configurations.name: Standard HTML5
configurations.description: Configuration for standard HTML5 documents.
configurations.parametersRaw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!-- Default rules for HTML5 -->
<!-- All configurations to use with the HTML5+ITS filter MUST map 'h' to the HTML namespace. -->
<its:rules xmlns:its="http://www.w3.org/2005/11/its" version="2.0"
 xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
 
 <!-- Inline elements
 <its:withinTextRule withinText="yes"
  selector="//h:abbr | //h:acronym | //h:br | //h:cite | //h:code | //h:dfn
  | //h:kbd | //h:q | //h:samp | //h:span | //h:strong | //h:var | //h:b | //h:em
  | //h:big | //h:hr | //h:i | //h:small | //h:sub | //h:sup | //h:tt | //h:del
  | //h:ins | //h:bdo | //h:img | //h:a | //h:font | //h:center | //h:s | //h:strike
  | //h:u | //h:isindex" />
  -->
  
 <!-- Non-translatable elements -->
 <its:translateRule selector="//h:script|//h:style" translate="no"/>
 
 <its:translateRule selector="//h:del" translate="no"/>
 <its:translateRule selector="//h:del/descendant-or-self::*/@*" translate="no"/>
 
 <!-- Translatable attribute -->
 <its:translateRule selector="//h:*/@abbr|//h:*/@alt|//h:*/@prompt|//h:*/@standby|//h:*/@summary|//h:*/@title" translate="yes"/>
 
 <its:translateRule selector="//h:meta[@name='keywords']/@content" translate="yes"/>
 <its:translateRule selector="//h:meta[@name='description']/@content" translate="yes"/>
		     
 <!-- Attributes for the input element -->
 <its:translateRule selector="//h:input/@value" translate="yes"/>
 <its:translateRule selector="//h:input[@type='hidden']/@value" translate="no"/>
 
 <!-- Bidirectional information. Note: No direct support for 'auto' value -->
 <its:dirRule selector="//h:*[@dir='ltr']" dir="ltr"/>
 <its:dirRule selector="//h:*[@dir='rtl']" dir="rtl"/>
 <its:dirRule selector="//h:bdo[@dir='ltr']" dir="lro"/>
 <its:dirRule selector="//h:bdo[@dir='rtl']" dir="rlo"/>

 <!-- Note: dfn and dt don't match exactly the Terminology data category -->
  
 <!-- Id Value -->
 <its:idValueRule selector="//h:*[@id]" idValue="@id"/>
 
 <!-- Preserve space -->
 <its:preserveSpaceRule selector="//h:pre|//h:textarea" space="preserve"/>
 
 <!-- Domain -->
 <its:domainRule selector="/h:html"
 	domainPointer="/h:html/h:head/h:meta[@name='dcterms.subject' or @name='keywords']/@content"/>

</its:rules>

exceptions.description: Comma-separated list of keys to exclude from extraction.

useKeyAsName.description: Use JSON key as the Block (TextUnit) name for reference.

useCodeFinder.description: Enable pattern-based detection of inline codes (placeholders, tags, etc.)

useFullKeyPath.description: Use full path (/key1/key2) instead of immediate key as name.

useLeadingSlashOnKeyPath.description: Include leading slash in key path names.

rules.description: List of regex patterns to detect inline codes

pattern.description: Regex pattern for inline code detection

sample.description: Sample text to test patterns against

useAllRulesWhenTesting.description: Test all rules together or individually

escapeForwardSlashes.description: Escape forward slashes in output JSON (\/).

noteRules.description: Regex for keys whose values become translator notes.

extractionRules.description: Regex pattern for JSON paths to extract. Overrides extractAllPairs when specified.

idRules.description: Regex for keys whose values become Block IDs (overrides useKeyAsName).

genericMetaRules.description: Regex for keys whose values become generic metadata.

configurations.name: Plain Text (Paragraphs)
configurations.description: Text files extracted by paragraphs (separated by 1 or more empty lines).
configurations.parametersRaw:
#v1
unescapeSource.b=true
trimLeading.b=false
trimTrailing.b=false
preserveWS.b=true
useCodeFinder.b=false
codeFinderRules=#v1$0a$count.i=2$0a$rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn]$0a$rule1=(\\r\\n)|\\a|\\b|\\f|\\n|\\r|\\t|\\v$0a$sample=$0a$useAllRulesWhenTesting.b=false
wrapMode.i=0
extractParagraphs.b=true
parametersClass=net.sf.okapi.filters.plaintext.paragraphs.Parameters

okf_po.v1.description: Configuration for the Okapi PO Filter Filter

configurations.name: PO (Standard)
configurations.description: Standard bilingual PO files

configurations.name: PO (Monolingual)
configurations.description: Monolingual PO files (msgid is a real ID, not the source text).
configurations.parametersRaw:
#v1
bilingualMode.b=false
makeID.b=true
useLD.b=true
localizeOutside.b=true
useCodeFinder.b=true
codeFinderRules.count.i=3
codeFinderRules.rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn]
codeFinderRules.rule1=(\\r\\n)|\\a|\\b|\\f|\\n|\\r|\\t|\\v
codeFinderRules.rule2=\{\d.*?\}
codeFinderRules.sample=%s, %d, {1}, \n, \r, \t, etc.
codeFinderRules.useAllRulesWhenTesting.b=true

allowEmptyOutputTarget.description: Allow empty target in output when no translation.

bilingualMode.description: Process file in bilingual mode (source and target).

useCodeFinder.description: Enable pattern-based detection of inline codes (placeholders, tags, etc.)

codeFinderRules.description: Regex patterns to identify inline codes in translatable text

rules.description: List of regex patterns to detect inline codes

pattern.description: Regex pattern for inline code detection

sample.description: Sample text to test patterns against

useAllRulesWhenTesting.description: Test all rules together or individually

configurations.parametersRaw: #v1 useLd.b=true localizeOutside.b=true startString=" endString=" extractOuterStrings.b=false useBSlashEscape.b=true useDoubleCharEscape.b=false oneLevelGroups.b=false regexOptions.i=40 mimeType=text/plain ruleCount.i=1 rule0.ruleName=Rule rule0.ruleType.i=1 rule0.expr=^(\d+:\d+:\d+.*?)\n(.*?)(\n\n+|\z) rule0.groupSource.i=2 rule0.groupTarget.i=-1 rule0.groupName.i=-1 rule0.groupNote.i=1 rule0.preserveWS.b=true rule0.useCodeFinder.b=true rule0.sample=1$0a$00:00:06,020 --> 00:00:07,020$0a$Hi, everyone.$0a$this is more$0a$$0a$2$0a$00:00:07,020 --> 00:00:08,020$0a$My name is Randy Becker.$0a$$0a$3$0a$00:00:08,020 --> 00:00:11,000$0a$I'm an application engineer at Keysight Technologies. rule0.codeFinderRules.count.i=1 rule0.codeFinderRules.rule0=<\w+.*?>| rule0.codeFinderRules.sample=test bold, test rule0.codeFinderRules.useAllRulesWhenTesting.b=false metaRuleCount.i=2 metaRule0.ruleName=subtitle_start_display metaRule0.expr=\d+:\S+(?=\s+-->) metaRule1.ruleName=subtitle_end_display metaRule1.expr=(?<=-->\s{1,50})\d+:\S+

parameters.rule0.sample: 1$0a$00:00:06,020 --> 00:00:07,020$0a$Hi, everyone.$0a$this is more$0a$$0a$2$0a$00:00:07,020 --> 00:00:08,020$0a$My name is Randy Becker.$0a$$0a$3$0a$00:00:08,020 --> 00:00:11,000$0a$I'm an application engineer at Keysight Technologies.

configurations.name: Text (Mac Strings)
configurations.description: Configuration for Macintosh .strings files.
configurations.parametersRaw:
#v1
regexOptions.i=40
startString="
endString="
extractOuterStrings.b=false
useBSlashEscape.b=true
useDoubleCharEscape.b=false
mimeType=text/plain
oneLevelGroups.b=false
useLd.b=true
localizeOutside.b=true
ruleCount.i=6
rule0.ruleName=Comments+String
rule0.ruleType.i=0
rule0.expr=/\*(.*?)\*/\n"(.*?)"\s*=(.*?(?<!\\)(?:\\{2})*");
rule0.groupSource.i=3
rule0.groupTarget.i=-1
rule0.groupName.i=2
rule0.groupNote.i=1
rule0.preserveWS.b=true
rule0.useCodeFinder.b=true
rule0.sample=/* Menu item to make the current document plain text */$0a$"Make Plain Text" = "Make Plain \"Text";$0a$/* Menu item to make the current document rich text */$0a$"Make Rich Text" = "Make Rich Text";$0a$/* An unquoted key */$0a$NSSomeKey = "Foobar";
rule0.codeFinderRules.count.i=3
rule0.codeFinderRules.rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn@]
rule0.codeFinderRules.rule1=(\\r\\n)|\\a|\\b|\\f|\\n|\\r|\\t|\\v
rule0.codeFinderRules.rule2=\<(/?)\w+[^>]*?>
rule0.codeFinderRules.sample=
rule0.codeFinderRules.useAllRulesWhenTesting.b=false
rule1.ruleName=Comments+Unquoted-Key String
rule1.ruleType.i=0
rule1.expr=/\*(.*?)\*/\n([^"\s]+)\s*=(.*?(?<!\\)(?:\\{2})*");
rule1.groupSource.i=3
rule1.groupTarget.i=-1
rule1.groupName.i=2
rule1.groupNote.i=1
rule1.preserveWS.b=true
rule1.useCodeFinder.b=true
rule1.sample=/* An unquoted key */$0a$NSSomeKey = "Foobar";$0a$/* Another unquoted key */$0a$NSSomeKey2 = "Bizbaz";
rule1.codeFinderRules.count.i=3
rule1.codeFinderRules.sample=
rule1.codeFinderRules.useAllRulesWhenTesting.b=false
rule2.ruleName=Bracketing Comments
rule2.ruleType.i=3
rule2.expr=/\*(.*?)\*/
rule2.groupSource.i=1
rule2.groupTarget.i=-1
rule2.groupName.i=-1
rule2.groupNote.i=-1
rule2.preserveWS.b=true
rule2.useCodeFinder.b=false
rule2.sample=test /* test */
rule2.codeFinderRules.count.i=0
rule2.codeFinderRules.sample=
rule2.codeFinderRules.useAllRulesWhenTesting.b=false
rule3.ruleName=Line Comments
rule3.ruleType.i=3
rule3.expr=//(.*?)\n
rule3.groupSource.i=-1
rule3.groupTarget.i=-1
rule3.groupName.i=-1
rule3.groupNote.i=-1
rule3.preserveWS.b=true
rule3.useCodeFinder.b=false
rule3.sample=// test$0a$test // bbb$0a$
rule3.codeFinderRules.count.i=0
rule3.codeFinderRules.rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn@]
rule3.codeFinderRules.rule1=(\\r\\n)|\\a|\\b|\\f|\\n|\\r|\\t|\\v
rule3.codeFinderRules.rule2=\<(/?)\w+[^>]*?>
rule3.codeFinderRules.sample=
rule3.codeFinderRules.useAllRulesWhenTesting.b=false
rule1.codeFinderRules.rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn@]
rule1.codeFinderRules.rule1=(\\r\\n)|\\a|\\b|\\f|\\n|\\r|\\t|\\v
rule1.codeFinderRules.rule2=\<(/?)\w+[^>]*?>
rule4.ruleName=String
rule4.ruleType.i=0
rule4.expr="(.*?)"\s*=(.*?(?<!\\)(?:\\{2})*");
rule4.groupSource.i=2
rule4.groupTarget.i=-1
rule4.groupName.i=1
rule4.groupNote.i=-1
rule4.preserveWS.b=true
rule4.useCodeFinder.b=true
rule4.sample=/* Menu item to make the current document plain text */$0a$"Make Plain Text" = "Make Plain \"Text";$0a$/* Menu item to make the current document rich text */$0a$"Make Rich Text" = "Make Rich Text";$0a$
rule4.codeFinderRules.count.i=3
rule4.codeFinderRules.rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn@]
rule4.codeFinderRules.rule1=(\\r\\n)|\\a|\\b|\\f|\\n|\\r|\\t|\\v
rule4.codeFinderRules.rule2=\<(/?)\w+[^>]*?>
rule4.codeFinderRules.sample=
rule4.codeFinderRules.useAllRulesWhenTesting.b=false
rule5.ruleName=Unquoted-Key String
rule5.ruleType.i=0
rule5.expr=([^\s"]+?)\s*=(.*?(?<!\\)(?:\\{2})*");
rule5.groupSource.i=2
rule5.groupTarget.i=-1
rule5.groupName.i=1
rule5.groupNote.i=-1
rule5.preserveWS.b=true
rule5.useCodeFinder.b=true
rule5.sample=/* An unquoted key */$0a$NSSomeKey = "Foobar";$0a$/* Another unquoted key */$0a$NSSomeKey2 = "Bizbaz";
rule5.codeFinderRules.count.i=3
rule5.codeFinderRules.rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn@]
rule5.codeFinderRules.rule1=(\\r\\n)|\\a|\\b|\\f|\\n|\\r|\\t|\\v
rule5.codeFinderRules.rule2=\<(/?)\w+[^>]*?>
rule5.codeFinderRules.sample=
rule5.codeFinderRules.useAllRulesWhenTesting.b=false
