parameters.rule1.sample: /* An unquoted key */$0a$NSSomeKey = "Foobar";$0a$/* Another unquoted key */$0a$NSSomeKey2 = "Bizbaz";
parameters.rule3.sample: // test$0a$test // bbb$0a$
parameters.rule4.sample: /* Menu item to make the current document plain text */$0a$"Make Plain Text" = "Make Plain \"Text";$0a$/* Menu item to make the current document rich text */$0a$"Make Rich Text" = "Make Rich Text";$0a$

okf_regexplaintext.v1.title: okf_plaintext_regex Filter
okf_regexplaintext.v1.description: Configuration for the Okapi okf_plaintext_regex Filter

configurations.name: Plain Text (Regex)
configurations.description: Plain Text Filter using regex-based linebreak search. Detects a wider range of linebreaks at the price of lower speed and extra memory usage.

configurations.name: Plain Text (Regex, Line=Paragraph)
configurations.description: Plain Text Filter using regex-based linebreak search. Extracts by lines.
configurations.parametersRaw:
#v1
unescapeSource.b=true
trimLeading.b=false
trimTrailing.b=false
preserveWS.b=true
useCodeFinder.b=false
codeFinderRules=#v1$0a$count.i=2$0a$rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn]$0a$rule1=(\\r\\n)|\\a|\\b|\\f|\\n|\\r|\\t|\\v$0a$sample=$0a$useAllRulesWhenTesting.b=false
wrapMode.i=0
rule=(^(?=.+))(.*?)$
sourceGroup.i=2
regexOptions.i=8
sample=$0d$$0a$This is the first sentence. And this is the second one.$0d$$0a$Second paragraph. Each one ends at the line-break.$0d$$0a$$0d$$0a$Third paragraph.$0d$$0a$And the last paragraph may have no line-break.
parametersClass=net.sf.okapi.filters.plaintext.regex.Parameters

parameters.sample: $0d$$0a$This is the first sentence. And this is the second one.$0d$$0a$Second paragraph. Each one ends at the line-break.$0d$$0a$$0d$$0a$Third paragraph.$0d$$0a$And the last paragraph may have no line-break.

sample=$0d$$0a$This is the first sentence. And this is the second one.$0d$$0a$Second paragraph. Each one ends at the line-break.$0d$$0a$$0d$$0a$Third paragraph.$0d$$0a$And the last paragraph may have no line-break.

configurations.name: Spliced Lines
configurations.description: Extracts as one line the consecutive lines with a predefined splicer character at the end.

configurations.name: Spliced Lines (Backslash)
configurations.description: Spliced lines filter with the backslash character (\) used as the splicer.
configurations.parametersRaw:
#v1
unescapeSource.b=true
trimLeading.b=false
trimTrailing.b=false
preserveWS.b=true
useCodeFinder.b=false
codeFinderRules=#v1$0a$count.i=2$0a$rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn]$0a$rule1=(\\r\\n)|\\a|\\b|\\f|\\n|\\r|\\t|\\v$0a$sample=$0a$useAllRulesWhenTesting.b=false
wrapMode.i=0
splicer=\
createPlaceholders.b=true
parametersClass=net.sf.okapi.filters.plaintext.spliced.Parameters

configurations.parametersRaw:
#v1
unescapeSource.b=true

useOkapiSegmentation.title: Use Okapi segmentation for output
useOkapiSegmentation.description:
If disabled, all XINI segments with the same value
of the attribute 'SegmentIDBeforeSegmentation' will be merged.
If the XINI was not segmented, it will remain unsegmented.
If this option is enabled, new segmentation
(i.e. from segmentation step) will be used for the output.

simplifierRules.description: Rules for simplifying inline code representation

x-groups.label: Inline Code Handling
x-groups.description: Configure detection and handling of inline codes (placeholders, tags, etc.)

configurations.name: Generic XML
configurations.description: Configuration for generic XML documents (default ITS rules).

configurations.name: RESX
configurations.description: Configuration for Microsoft RESX documents (without binary data).
configurations.parametersRaw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<its:rules xmlns:its="http://www.w3.org/2005/11/its"
 xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"
 xmlns:itsx="http://www.w3.org/2008/12/its-extensions"
 xmlns:okp="okapi-framework:xmlfilter-options"
 its:translate="no" version="1.0">

<!-- This is a set of rules to process .ResX files. Be aware that any text in Base64 entries
like text items declared in a list box, will not be processed using this method.
These rules can also be used on simple .resx files that have just string entries.  -->
  
 <its:translateRule selector="/root" translate="no"/>
 <its:translateRule selector="//data[not(@type) and not(starts-with(@name, '>'))]/value" translate="yes" itsx:idValue="../@name"/>
 <its:translateRule selector="//data[@mimetype]/value" translate="no"/>
 <its:translateRule selector="//data[substring(@name, string-length(@name) - string-length('.Name')+1)='.Name']/value" translate="no"/>
 <its:translateRule selector="//data[@name='$this.Text']/value" translate="yes" itsx:idValue="../@name"/>
 
 <!-- Localization notes -->
 <its:locNoteRule locNoteType="description"
  locNotePointer="../comment" selector="//data[not(@type) and not(starts-with(@name, '>') or starts-with(@name, '$'))]/value"/>
<okp:codeFinder useCodeFinder="yes">#v1
count.i=2
rule0=(\{[^}]+?\})
rule1=\<(/?)\w+[^>]*?>
</okp:codeFinder>
</its:rules>

configurations.name: Mozilla RDF
configurations.description: Configuration for Mozilla RDF documents.
configurations.parametersRaw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<its:rules xmlns:its="http://www.w3.org/2005/11/its" version="1.0"

 <its:translateRule selector="//*/@nc:name" translate="yes"/>
</its:rules>

configurations.name: Java Properties XML
configurations.description: Configuration for Java Properties files in XML.
configurations.parametersRaw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<its:rules xmlns:its="http://www.w3.org/2005/11/its" version="1.0"
 xmlns:itsx="http://www.w3.org/2008/12/its-extensions">
<!-- See ITS specification at: http://www.w3.org/TR/its/ -->
 <its:translateRule selector="/properties" translate="no"/>
 <its:translateRule selector="//entry" itsx:idValue="@key" translate="yes"/>
</its:rules>

configurations.name: Android Strings
configurations.description: Configuration for Android Strings XML documents.
configurations.parametersRaw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<its:rules xmlns:its="http://www.w3.org/2005/11/its"
	   xmlns:itsx="http://www.w3.org/2008/12/its-extensions"
	   xmlns:a="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
	   xmlns:okp="okapi-framework:xmlfilter-options"
	   version="1.0">
  <its:translateRule selector="/*" translate="no"/>
  <its:translateRule selector="//*/@a:text[not(starts-with(.,'@'))]" translate="yes" itsx:whiteSpaces="preserve" />
  <its:translateRule selector="//string[not(@product)]" translate="yes" itsx:idValue="./@name" itsx:whiteSpaces="preserve" />
  <its:translateRule selector="//string[@product]" translate="yes" itsx:idValue="concat(@name, '_', @product)" itsx:whiteSpaces="preserve" />
  <its:translateRule selector="//item[@quantity]" translate="yes" itsx:idValue="concat(../@name, '_', @quantity)" itsx:whiteSpaces="preserve" />
  <its:translateRule selector="//item[not(@quantity)]" translate="yes" itsx:idValue="concat(../@name, '_', count(preceding-sibling::item))" itsx:whiteSpaces="preserve" />
  <its:withinTextRule selector="//string/descendant::*|//item/descendant::*" withinText="yes"/>
  <its:translateRule selector="//*[@translatable = 'false']" translate="no"/>
  <okp:codeFinder useCodeFinder="yes">#v1
count.i=2
rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn]
rule1=\{\d.*?\}
  </okp:codeFinder>
</its:rules>

configurations.name: WiX Localization
configurations.description: Configuration for WiX (Windows Installer XML) Localization files.
configurations.parametersRaw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<its:rules xmlns:its="http://www.w3.org/2005/11/its"
	       xmlns:itsx="http://www.w3.org/2008/12/its-extensions"
           xmlns:w="http://schemas.microsoft.com/wix/2006/localization"
           its:translate="no" version="1.0">

  <its:translateRule selector="/w:WixLocalization" translate="no"/>
  <its:translateRule selector="//w:String[@Overridable!='no']" translate="yes" itsx:idValue="./@Id"/>

</its:rules>

configurations.name: Apple Stringsdict
configurations.description: Configuration for Apple Stringsdict files
configurations.parametersRaw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<its:rules
    xmlns:its="http://www.w3.org/2005/11/its"
    xmlns:itsx="http://www.w3.org/2008/12/its-extensions"
    xmlns:okp="okapi-framework:xmlfilter-options"
    version="1.0">
  
  <its:translateRule selector="/plist/dict/dict/string"
                     translate="yes"
                     itsx:idValue="concat(
                                   ../preceding-sibling::key[position()=1],
                                   '_',
                                   preceding-sibling::key[position()=1])"/>

  <its:translateRule selector="/plist/dict/dict/dict/string"
                     translate="yes"
                     itsx:idValue="concat(
                                   ../../preceding-sibling::key[position()=1],
                                   '_',
                                   ../preceding-sibling::key[position()=1],
                                   '_',
                                   preceding-sibling::key[position()=1])"/>
  
  <!-- Do not translate strings for keys NSStringFormatSpecTypeKey, NSStringFormatValueTypeKey -->
  <its:translateRule selector="//dict/dict/key[. = 'NSStringFormatSpecTypeKey' or . = 'NSStringFormatValueTypeKey']/following-sibling::string[position()=1]"
                     translate="no"/>
  <its:translateRule selector="//key" translate="no"/>

  <okp:codeFinder useCodeFinder="yes">#v1
count.i=4
rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn@]
rule1=(\\r\\n)|\\a|\\b|\\f|\\n|\\r|\\t|\\v
rule2=\<(/?)\w+[^>]*?>
rule3=%\d?\$?#@[^@]+@
  </okp:codeFinder>
</its:rules>

configurations.name: DocBook
configurations.description: Configuration for DocBook v5 files
configurations.parametersRaw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<its:rules version="1.0" xmlns:its="http://www.w3.org/2005/11/its"
		   xmlns:itsx="http://www.w3.org/2008/12/its-extensions"
		   xmlns:db="http://docbook.org/ns/docbook">
	<!-- Inline elements -->
	<its:withinTextRule selector="
	//db:abbrev|//db:acronym|//db:emphasis|//db:phrase|//db:quote|//db:trademark|
	//db:ancor|//db:citation|//db:citerefentry|//db:citetitle|//db:firstterm|//db:glossterm|//db:link|//db:olink|//db:xref|
	//db:foreignphrase|//db:wordasword|//db:computeroutput|//db:literal|//db:markup|//db:prompt|//db:replaceable|//db:tag|//db:userinput|
	//db:inlineequation|//db:mathphrase|//db:subscript|//db:superscript|
	//db:accel|//db:guibutton|//db:guiicon|//db:guilabel|//db:guimenu|//db:guimenuitem|//db:guisubmenu|
	//db:keycap|//db:keycode|//db:keycombo|//db:keysym|//db:menuchoice|//db:mousebutton|//db:shortcut|
	//db:classname|//db:constant|//db:errorcode|//db:errorname|//db:errortype|//db:function|
	//db:msgtext|//db:parameter|//db:property|//db:replaceable|//db:returnvalue|//db:symbol|//db:token|//db:type|//db:varname|
	//db:application|//db:comand|//db:envar|//db:filename|//db:msgtext|//db:option|//db:parameter|//db:prompt|//db:systemitem|
	//db:database|//db:email|//db:hardware|//db:optional"
						withinText="yes"/>

	<!-- Elements that should not be translated. -->
	<its:translateRule selector="
	//db:computeroutput|//db:programlisting|//db:screen|//db:screenshot|//db:synopsis|
	//db:literallayout|
	//db:mathphrase/*|//db:inlineequation/*" translate="no"/>

	<!-- These should be translated and the spaces have to be preserved. -->
	<!-- Currently, literallayout would be the only one where the spaces should be preserved
		 but it is set not to be translated, as it is listed in translateRule/@selector above.
	     To make literallayout translatable, remove it from the selector and uncomment the line below. -->
	<!-- its:preserveSpaceRule selector="//db:literallayout" space="preserve"/ -->

	<!-- These elements should generate a separate flaw of text.
		 Based on https://www.w3.org/TR/xml-i18n-bp/#docbook
	     ITSFilter DOES NOT HANDLE withinText="nested" as of March 2021, however,
	     and this has no real effect. -->
	<its:withinTextRule withinText="nested" selector="
	//db:alt|
	//db:footnote|
	//db:remark|
	//db:indexterm|
	//db:primary|
	//db:secondary|
	//db:tertiary"/>
</its:rules>

configurations.name: RESX
configurations.description: Configuration for Microsoft RESX documents (without binary data).
configurations.parametersRaw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<its:rules xmlns:its="http://www.w3.org/2005/11/its"
 xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"
 xmlns:itsx="http://www.w3.org/2008/12/its-extensions"
 xmlns:okp="okapi-framework:xmlfilter-options"
 its:translate="no" version="1.0">

<!-- This is a set of rules to process .ResX files. Be aware that any text in Base64 entries
like text items declared in a list box, will not be processed using this method.
These rules can also be used on simple .resx files that have just string entries.  -->
  
 <its:translateRule selector="/root" translate="no"/>
 <its:translateRule selector="//data[not(@type) and not(starts-with(@name, '>'))]/value" translate="yes" itsx:idValue="../@name"/>
 <its:translateRule selector="//data[@mimetype]/value" translate="no"/>
 <its:translateRule selector="//data[substring(@name, string-length(@name) - string-length('.Name')+1)='.Name']/value" translate="no"/>
 <its:translateRule selector="//data[@name='$this.Text']/value" translate="yes" itsx:idValue="../@name"/>
 
 <!-- Localization notes -->
 <its:locNoteRule locNoteType="description"
  locNotePointer="../comment" selector="//data[not(@type) and not(starts-with(@name, '>') or starts-with(@name, '$'))]/value"/>
<okp:codeFinder useCodeFinder="yes">#v1
count.i=2
rule0=(\{[^}]+?\})
rule1=\<(/?)\w+[^>]*?>
</okp:codeFinder>
</its:rules>

configurations.name: Android Strings
configurations.description: Configuration for Android Strings XML documents.
configurations.parametersRaw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<its:rules xmlns:its="http://www.w3.org/2005/11/its"
	   xmlns:itsx="http://www.w3.org/2008/12/its-extensions"
	   xmlns:a="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
	   xmlns:okp="okapi-framework:xmlfilter-options"
	   version="1.0">
  <its:translateRule selector="/*" translate="no"/>
  <its:translateRule selector="//*/@a:text[not(starts-with(.,'@'))]" translate="yes" itsx:whiteSpaces="preserve" />
  <its:translateRule selector="//string[not(@product)]" translate="yes" itsx:idValue="./@name" itsx:whiteSpaces="preserve" />
  <its:translateRule selector="//string[@product]" translate="yes" itsx:idValue="concat(@name, '_', @product)" itsx:whiteSpaces="preserve" />
  <its:translateRule selector="//item[@quantity]" translate="yes" itsx:idValue="concat(../@name, '_', @quantity)" itsx:whiteSpaces="preserve" />
  <its:translateRule selector="//item[not(@quantity)]" translate="yes" itsx:idValue="concat(../@name, '_', count(preceding-sibling::item))" itsx:whiteSpaces="preserve" />
  <its:withinTextRule selector="//string/descendant::*|//item/descendant::*" withinText="yes"/>
  <its:translateRule selector="//*[@translatable = 'false']" translate="no"/>
  <okp:codeFinder useCodeFinder="yes">#v1
count.i=2
rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn]
rule1=\{\d.*?\}
  </okp:codeFinder>
</its:rules>

	       xmlns:itsx="http://www.w3.org/2008/12/its-extensions"
           xmlns:w="http://schemas.microsoft.com/wix/2006/localization"
           its:translate="no" version="1.0">

  <its:translateRule selector="/w:WixLocalization" translate="no"/>
  <its:translateRule selector="//w:String[@Overridable!='no']" translate="yes" itsx:idValue="./@Id"/>

</its:rules>

configurations.name: Apple Stringsdict
configurations.description: Configuration for Apple Stringsdict files
configurations.parametersRaw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<its:rules
    xmlns:its="http://www.w3.org/2005/11/its"
    xmlns:itsx="http://www.w3.org/2008/12/its-extensions"
    xmlns:okp="okapi-framework:xmlfilter-options"
    version="1.0">
  
  <its:translateRule selector="/plist/dict/dict/string"
                     translate="yes"
                     itsx:idValue="concat(
                                   ../preceding-sibling::key[position()=1],
                                   '_',
                                   preceding-sibling::key[position()=1])"/>

  <its:translateRule selector="/plist/dict/dict/dict/string"
                     translate="yes"
                     itsx:idValue="concat(
                                   ../../preceding-sibling::key[position()=1],
                                   '_',
                                   ../preceding-sibling::key[position()=1],
                                   '_',
                                   preceding-sibling::key[position()=1])"/>
  
  <!-- Do not translate strings for keys NSStringFormatSpecTypeKey, NSStringFormatValueTypeKey -->
  <its:translateRule selector="//dict/dict/key[. = 'NSStringFormatSpecTypeKey' or . = 'NSStringFormatValueTypeKey']/following-sibling::string[position()=1]"
                     translate="no"/>
  <its:translateRule selector="//key" translate="no"/>

  <okp:codeFinder useCodeFinder="yes">#v1
count.i=4
rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn@]
rule1=(\\r\\n)|\\a|\\b|\\f|\\n|\\r|\\t|\\v
rule2=\<(/?)\w+[^>]*?>
rule3=%\d?\$?#@[^@]+@
  </okp:codeFinder>
</its:rules>

configurations.name: DocBook
configurations.description: Configuration for DocBook v5 files
configurations.parametersRaw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<its:rules version="1.0" xmlns:its="http://www.w3.org/2005/11/its"
    xmlns:itsx="http://www.w3.org/2008/12/its-extensions"
    xmlns:db="http://docbook.org/ns/docbook">
    <!-- Inline elements -->

        //db:abbrev|//db:acronym|//db:emphasis|//db:phrase|//db:quote|//db:trademark|
        //db:anchor|//db:citation|//db:citerefentry|//db:citetitle|//db:firstterm|//db:glossterm|//db:link|//db:olink|//db:xref|

        //db:inlineequation|//db:mathphrase|//db:subscript|//db:superscript|
        //db:accel|//db:guibutton|//db:guiicon|//db:guilabel|//db:guimenu|//db:guimenuitem|//db:guisubmenu|
        //db:keycap|//db:keycode|//db:keycombo|//db:keysym|//db:menuchoice|//db:mousebutton|//db:shortcut|
        //db:classname|//db:constant|//db:errorcode|//db:errorname|//db:errortype|//db:function|
        //db:msgtext|//db:parameter|//db:property|//db:replaceable|//db:returnvalue|//db:symbol|//db:token|//db:type|//db:varname|
        //db:application|//db:command|//db:envar|//db:filename|//db:msgtext|//db:option|//db:parameter|//db:prompt|//db:systemitem|
        //db:database|//db:email|//db:hardware|//db:optional|//db:cover|//db:comment"
        withinText="yes"/>

    <!-- Elements that should not be translated. -->
    <its:translateRule selector="
        //db:computeroutput|//db:programlisting|//db:screen|//db:screenshot|//db:synopsis|
        //db:literallayout|
        //db:mathphrase/*|//db:inlineequation/*" translate="no"/>

    <!-- These should be translated and the spaces have to be preserved. -->
    <!-- Currently, literallayout would be the only one where the spaces should be preserved
         but it is set not to be translated, as it is listed in translateRule/@selector above.
         To make literallayout translatable, remove it from the selector and uncomment the line below. -->

    <its:withinTextRule withinText="nested" selector="
        //db:alt|
        //db:footnote|
        //db:remark|
        //db:indexterm|
        //db:primary|
        //db:secondary|
        //db:tertiary"/>
</its:rules>

okf_xmlstream.v1.title: XML Stream Filter Filter
okf_xmlstream.v1.description: Configuration for the Okapi XML Stream Filter Filter

configurations.name: XML Stream
configurations.description: Large XML Documents
configurations.parametersRaw:
assumeWellformed: true
preserve_whitespace: false

attributes:
  # attributes that can appear anywhere
  'xml:lang':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]
  
  # This rule will not apply unless TEXT_UNIT element rules are defined which may have an id
  'xml:id':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_ID]
  'id':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_ID]
  
  'xml:space':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_PRESERVE_WHITESPACE]
    preserve: ['xml:space', EQUALS, preserve]
    default: ['xml:space', EQUALS, default]

configurations.name: DITA
configurations.description: DITA XML
configurations.parametersRaw:
assumeWellformed: true
preserve_whitespace: false

attributes:
  # attributes that can appear anywhere
  'xml:lang':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]
  
  # This rule will not apply unless TEXT_UNIT element rules are defined which may have an id
  'xml:id':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_ID]
  'id':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_ID]
  
  'xml:space':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_PRESERVE_WHITESPACE]
    preserve: ['xml:space', EQUALS, preserve]
    default: ['xml:space', EQUALS, default]

elements:
  # translatable attributes
  othermeta:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [content]
  
  topicref:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [navtitle]
  
  topicgroup:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [navtitle]
  
  topichead:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [navtitle]
    
  note:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [othertype]
  
  lq:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [reftitle]
  
  object:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [standby]
  
  map:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [title]
   
  state:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [value]
  
  data:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [label]
  
  vrm:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [version]
    
  # pre-formatted elements
  pre:
    ruleTypes: [PRESERVE_WHITESPACE]
  lines:
    ruleTypes: [PRESERVE_WHITESPACE]
  screen:
    ruleTypes: [PRESERVE_WHITESPACE]

  # exclusion rules
  '.*':

attributes:

preserve_whitespace: false

  'xml:lang':
